results.name: Decimal expansion of solution to n/x = x-n for n = 7.
comment: n/x = x-n with n=1 gives the Golden Ratio = 1.6180339887...
Equals n +n/(n +n/(n +n/(n +....))) for n = 7.  See also A090388. - _Stanislav Sykora_, Jan 23 2014
link: Chai Wah Wu, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10001
